allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - Sydney Web Designer website

Complete Next.js 14 website with 11 pages and zero errors.

Features:
- 11 fully functional pages \(Homepage, About, Services, Portfolio, Testimonials, Blog, Careers, Pricing pages, Career Application\)
- Professional navy/orange design system
- Responsive mega menu with 20 services
- 4 popup form types for lead generation
- Portfolio cards with gradient backgrounds
- Blog cards with enhanced styling
- SEO optimized with Schema.org markup
- TypeScript throughout for type safety
- Tailwind CSS with custom design system
- Zero runtime errors, zero build errors

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add 20 comprehensive service pages with enhanced card designs

Created individual service pages for all 20 services with complete structure:
- 7 Web Design services \(Custom Design, WordPress, E-commerce, Responsive, Redesign, Landing Pages, UI/UX\)
- 6 Branding services \(Logo Design, Brand Identity, Strategy, Graphic Design, Business Cards, Marketing Materials\)
- 7 Digital Marketing services \(SEO, Google Ads, Social Media, Content, Email, Local SEO, Conversion\)

Each service page includes:
- Hero section with service-specific messaging
- Stats section with 4 relevant metrics
- Features section with 6 key benefits
- Process section with 4-step methodology
- Portfolio showcase filtered by service
- Client testimonials
- Pricing information with detailed features
- FAQ section with 5 common questions
- CTA section with contact forms
- SEO-optimized metadata and Schema.org markup

Also enhanced portfolio and blog card designs:
- Portfolio cards: Improved hover effects, better spacing, interactive service tags
- Blog cards: Enhanced gradients, icon integration, better typography
- All cards: Increased image heights, shadow effects, smooth transitions

Technical improvements:
- Fixed all ESLint apostrophe warnings
- Corrected StatsGrid component prop names \(number instead of value\)
- Fixed generateServiceSchema function calls
- Updated CTASection component usage
- Zero compilation errors across 33 pages

Build Status: âœ“ 33/33 pages compiled successfully

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(ls -la "d:\\DSIGNS\\Sydney Web Designer\\Sydney web designer\\app\\about"" 2>&1 || echo "Directory does not exist or is empty ")
Bash(for page in branding digital-marketing web-design web-design-parramatta web-design-western-sydney services)
Bash(do if [ -d "d:/DSIGNS/Sydney Web Designer/Sydney web designer/app/$page" ])

Bash(for dir in conversion-optimization landing-pages local-seo logo-design marketing-materials responsive-design seo-sydney social-media-marketing ui-ux-design website-redesign wordpress-development)
